name: Sour Urkle
description: Sour Urkle is a hybrid cannabis strain that unites Sour Diesel and Purple Urkle, whose opposing sativa and indica genetics meet in a balanced and flavorful fusion. Hints of berry fight through the dominant skunky diesel smell of Sour Urkle, creating a complex aroma that will have you fighting your friends for the first taste. Its dense, rounded buds are caked in crystal-tipped trichomes that try their best to hide Sour Urkleâ€™s deep purple coloration to no avail.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Hungry, Uplifted, Happy, Focused, Depression, Stress, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Fatigue, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Anxious, Dizzy
